      • setAutoSave

        public void setAutoSave(boolean save)
        Sets the KeyStore to call save() automatically after each operation that modifies it (for example import key, delete key, etc.)
        Parameters:
        save - if true this KeyStore instance calls automatically it's save() method.
        See Also:
        save(), isAutoSave()

      • isAutoSave

        public boolean isAutoSave()
        Returns is auto save on. (true by default)
        Returns:
        true if auto save mode is on, otherwise false
        See Also:
        setAutoSave(boolean), save()

      • isBackupOnSave

        public boolean isBackupOnSave()
        Returns should backups be made on save. (true by default)
        Returns:
        true if backup file is created on save, otherwise false
        See Also:
        setBackupOnSave(boolean), save()

      • setBackupOnSave

        public void setBackupOnSave(boolean backupOnSave)
        Sets backup file be created (with extension .bak) for this KeyStore on save() operations.
        Parameters:
        backupOnSave - if true a backup file (with extension .bak) is created on each call to the save() method.
        See Also:
        isBackupOnSave(), save()

      • save

        public void save()
          throws PGPException
        Saves this KeyStore instance to disk.

        If isAutoSave() is true there is no need to be called explicitly, because it is called implicitly by all methods that change the state of this KeyStore instance.
        Throws:
        PGPException - error saving the state of this key store. Use the method getUnderlyingException() to see the cause.

      • save

        public void save(boolean mandatorySave)
          throws PGPException
        Saves this KeyStore instance to disk.
        Parameters:
        mandatorySave - when false no actual write operation will be performed
        Throws:
        PGPException - I/O error

      • deleteSubKey

        public boolean deleteSubKey(java.lang.String hexId)
                     throws PGPException
        Removes a sub key form a key pair in this KeyStore Example: 
                        KeyStore keyStore = new KeyStore();
                                
                String newSubKeyId = "0A98F127";
 
                boolean keyWasRemoved = keyStore.deleteSubKey(newSubKeyId);
        Parameters:
        hexId - Short or long Hexadecimal Key ID of the sub key to be removed
        Returns:
        true if a key with matching headecimal Key ID was removed, otherwise false
        Throws:
        PGPException - error saving the KeyStore
        NoPrivateKeyFoundException - if there is no matching private key in this KeyStore
        NoPublicKeyFoundException - if there is no matching public key in this KeyStore

      • deleteSubKey

        public void deleteSubKey(long keyId)
                  throws PGPException
        Removes a sub key form a key pair in this KeyStore Example: 
                        KeyStore keyStore = new KeyStore();
                                
                long newSubKeyId = ...
 
                keyStore.deleteSubKey(newSubKeyId);
        Parameters:
        keyId - raw Key Id of the sub key that must be removed
        Throws:
        PGPException - error saving the KeyStore
        NoPrivateKeyFoundException - if there is no matching private key in this KeyStore
        NoPublicKeyFoundException - if there is no matching public key in this KeyStore

      • addSubKey

        public long addSubKey(java.lang.String userId,
             java.lang.String privateKeyPassword,
             boolean isEncryption,
             java.lang.String keyAlgorithm,
             int keySize)
               throws PGPException
        Adds a sub key to an existig OpenPGP key pair

        Example: 
         KeyStore keyStore = new KeyStore();
                
 // append a new sub key 
 boolean isEncryptionSubKey = true;
 int keySize = 2048;
 long newSubKeyId = keyStore.addSubKey("my key User Id", "my key password", isEncryptionSubKey, KeyAlgorithm.RSA, keySize);
        Parameters:
        userId - User Id or hexadecimal Key ID of the target key pair
        privateKeyPassword - the password for the private key of the key pair. It must exist in the KeyStore
        isEncryption - when true the sub key will be an encryption key, when false the sub key will be a signing key
        keyAlgorithm - the assymetric algorithm of the sub key. See : KeyAlgorithm
        keySize - the size of the new sub key in bits
        Returns:
        the raw Key ID of the newly added sub key. To convert it to hexadecimal format use KeyPairInformation.keyId2Hex(long)
        Throws:
        WrongPasswordException - if the specified private key password doesn't match
        NoPrivateKeyFoundException - if there is no matching private key in this KeyStore
        PGPException - if a key generation error has occured

      • addSubKey

        public long addSubKey(long keyId,
             java.lang.String privateKeyPassword,
             boolean isEncryption,
             EcCurve.Enum ecCurve)
               throws PGPException
        Adds a ECC OpenPGP sub key to an existig ECC OpenPGP key pair

        Example: 
         KeyStore keyStore = new KeyStore();
                
 // append a new sub key 
 boolean isEncryptionSubKey = true;
 long newSubKeyId = keyStore.addSubKey("my key User Id", "my key password", isEncryptionSubKey, EcCurve.Enum.NIST_P_521);
        Parameters:
        keyId - Key Id for a key in the target key pair
        privateKeyPassword - the password for the private key of the key pair. It must exist in the KeyStore
        isEncryption - when true the sub key will be an encryption key, when false the sub key will be a signing key
        ecCurve - the Elliptic Curve parameter for the key. See : EcCurve.Enum
        Returns:
        the raw Key ID of the newly added sub key. To convert it to hexadecimal format use KeyPairInformation.keyId2Hex(long)
        Throws:
        WrongPasswordException - if the specified private key password doesn't match
        NoPrivateKeyFoundException - if there is no matching private key in this KeyStore
        PGPException - if a key generation error has occured

      • addSubKey

        public long addSubKey(long keyId,
             java.lang.String privateKeyPassword,
             boolean isEncryption,
             java.lang.String keyAlgorithm,
             int keySize)
               throws PGPException
        Adds a sub key to an existing OpenPGP key pair

        Example: 
         KeyStore keyStore = new KeyStore();
                
 // append a new sub key 
 boolean isEncryptionSubKey = true;
 int keySize = 2048;
 long myKeyId = ...
 long newSubKeyId = keyStore.addSubKey(myKeyId, "my key password", isEncryptionSubKey, KeyAlgorithm.RSA, keySize);
        Parameters:
        keyId - Key Id for a key in the target key pair
        privateKeyPassword - the password for the private key of the key pair. It must exist in the KeyStore
        isEncryption - when true the sub key will be an encryption key, when false the sub key will be a signing key
        keyAlgorithm - the assymetric algorithm of the sub key. See : KeyAlgorithm
        keySize - the size of the new sub key in bits
        Returns:
        the raw Key ID of the newly added sub key. To convert it to hexadecimal format use KeyPairInformation.keyId2Hex(long)
        Throws:
        WrongPasswordException - if the specified private key password doesn't match
        NoPrivateKeyFoundException - if there is no matching private key in this KeyStore
        PGPException - if a key generation error has occured

      • keyId2Hex

        public static java.lang.String keyId2Hex(long keyId)
        Helper method that converts 8 byte key id (of type long) into a hexadecimal string obtained from the lower 4 bytes.
        This hexadecimal key id string is the same as the one displayed by PGP(r) and GnuPG/gpg.
        Parameters:
        keyId - Key ID of type long
        Returns:
        hexadecimal Key ID

      • keyIdToHex

        keyId - Key ID of type long
        Returns:
        hexadecimal Key ID
